original_title: Liquor stores islandwide closed on 25th and 26th December
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Excise Department says that liquor stores will be closed on the 25th and 26th of December.
Liquor stores will be closed on the 25th of December, on occasion of the Christmas Day.
However, this does not apply to star-class hotels approved by the Tourism Development Authority.
All the liquor stores islandwide will be closed on the 26th due to the Unduwap Poya day.
On Christmas eve, Pope Francis laments ‘futile’ war in Holy Land
